snippet.title: SNES Fever Pitch Soccer (US Head-On Soccer)
snippet.description: A late 1995 offering from U.S Gold to the genre for both SNES and Megadrive, "Fever Pitch Soccer" offers arcade soccer action that is best enjoyed with two players because the CPU opponents are incredibly hard. Each team has a number of star player that have special powers ranging from super shots, amazing curve shots and the good old fake diver. Solid, fun alternative to Pro Evolution and Fifa, should you get tired of those. Enjoy an exhibition match between Portugal and Japan.
